website_summaries.verdict: Despite some quality control issues, this wooden porch swing looks good, is well made, and comes at decent price point.
pros: Offers a basic yet attractive slat design with natural wood finish
Durable, and rated to hold up to 500 pounds
At 48 x 20.5 x 22 inches, it's suitable for smaller porches
cons: Assembly instructions are confusing and lack detail
Some packages arrived with damaged pieces

customer_reviews.title: I could put it together myself.
customer_reviews.text: I crashed my last front porch swing and wanted one that would last and not buckle under my weight. I'm about 180 pounds and 60 years old, but it was embarrassing to have the last swing crack and cave in. This new one was really easy to put together and I'm betting it will outlive me. The chains it hangs by are a little heavy and I think the maker should consider using 'familiar' porch swing chains. The sounds the swings make are as important as the overall feel of the swing.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Walker

customer_reviews.title: Cheap set of chains. Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: I put the swing itself together, and when I tried to screw in the chains, 2 of the 4 connections had stripped threads. Ok, it happens. I called, and Best Choice Products said they couldn’t send me a set of chains, I’d have to box up the whole thing and send it back so they could send me an entire replacement. Just got the replacement today, put it together, and guess what - 2 of the four chain screws have stripped threads. Makes me think this is a very cheap product.
customer_reviews.author: David Lackie

customer_reviews.title: Great for Shorter People
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little swing. It was easy to assemble, looks great, and seems very sturdy. My only complaint is the width of the seat. My husband and I are both fairly tall and the width of the seat is slightly smaller than is ideal for us.
customer_reviews.author: Michele J. Bourdo

customer_reviews.title: Surdy and well build for the money
customer_reviews.text: Seems very well build would actually have expected it to cost more. Finished with two coats of cedar natural stain and it is beautiful. Realize will need to be restained every couple of years. Directions are not very good and would need a tad of common sence to put together but not really hard to figure but one does need to stop and observe where screws vs pegs go.
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: BAD BUSINESS
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a gift, never assembled for about 90 days, when was assembled, one of the inserts in the arm holding the chain was bad, threads were bad, called Best Choice, COMPLETE idiots, did not want to help, just said swing out of warranty, their call, will go to lowes, get an eyebolt all the way through with a nut, better hope no one gets hurt over an insert
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Falsely advertised depth. This swing is only 16.5 inch deep. Fits only Kids not for adults
customer_reviews.text: This swing is advertised falsely. The depth is not 20.5 inch, it is only 16.5 inch and not comfortable to seat for an adult. Also screws provided are so cheap quality that it worn out even with hand tightening with screw driver. Now situation is i can not reverse or unassailable to return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, just needs a little adjustment
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good looking, sturdy swing. It was generally easy to assemble. Unlike a lot of swings, the seat is only 14" wide. Most are about 16-18". This makes it a little uncomfortable. Feel as though you might slide off. I had a seat cushion made with a little wider and thick foam. This makes it a lot better. The company might consider widening the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Sturdy, well constructed Beautifully finished wood Excellent assembly manual Great value for the money Cons: Chains not sized correctly; too long, too strong. I replaced all hardware with more appropriate materials I bought at my local hardware.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy swing nicely finished.
customer_reviews.text: There were issues with the shipment not making it here on time. I do not know if it was covid-19 related or not. I fully understand if it was. This is a beautiful swing. Very sturdy and nicely finished. Assembly instructions were easy to follow. I recommend this swing.
customer_reviews.author: billy

customer_reviews.title: Great swing for the price
customer_reviews.text: I assembled this swing in about 1 1/2 hours. Could be faster if they used phillips or torx screws. the allen wrench slowed me down. I had my cousin help put it up. All [parts were there and it went up easily. The swing is well built, seems quite good sturdy wood. As good as the more expensive on I had at my last house.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these to replace for that I had bought previously from a different supplier. These were excellent quality. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Swinging on the porch
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of our swing on the porch. Grand kids love it also. Easy to put together but a little hard on the back. Made a cushion for that. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: ShirleyAnn Wilson

customer_reviews.title: She loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife for mother's day. I added my own chain as not enough was supplied with it, but it's comfortable, has held up well so far and she loves it
customer_reviews.author: jessef250

customer_reviews.title: Nice bench
customer_reviews.text: Nice bench. Easy to assemble. The chain lengths were not quite right and we had to do some adjusting to get it to hang right. A nice sturdy bench all and all
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Little adjustment
customer_reviews.text: Because I have an old house had to get little different hardware to mount to the front porch. Everything else was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Conklin

customer_reviews.title: Short Seat
customer_reviews.text: Received this for Mother’s Day...The seat is super short only coming to mid thigh. I’m only 5.6 and swing is uncomfortable to use for extended time. Would have sent it back if wasn’t difficult.
customer_reviews.author: BeBe McClinton

customer_reviews.title: Decent replacement swing
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1. Quick delivery 2. Fairly easy assembly. 3. Nice looking 4. Seems to be sturdy. Cons: 1. Seat size smallish. Could be about 30% deeper. Summary: This is a nice replacement swing at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Isendale

customer_reviews.title: Assembly took around 1 hour.
customer_reviews.text: My previous hanging swing bench fell apart after 35 years. This has taken its place and fits the bill very nicely. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Helen Griffiths

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful addition for a Gazebo
customer_reviews.text: We hung this on our Gazebo..and have no complaints at all...the only problem was the tilt of the swing when it was hanging leaned too much forward but we tweaked the chain and it sits beautifully. . So happy with the amount of money spent..well worth every penny...had many comliments on our 4th of July party..
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Proffer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Great swing! The weight is odd so the swing is hung so that the back is tilted instead of upright.
customer_reviews.author: RJ W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy swing
customer_reviews.text: This is nice and sturdy. I’m sure I’ll get a lot of years use out of it
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Hart

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and strong swing. Well worth the price for a swing capable of holding 500 lbs .
customer_reviews.author: charles tyson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This was added to a swing frame with ease. Just had to purchase bigger D rings Update: I have had this for 4 months and the coating is all flaking off and some of the wood has cracks. I had to sand and seal with Thompsons water seal to protect it. Should not have to do this after such a short period of time. Otherwise I like my swing.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie K or Donald L Harsley

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be tipped back a bit for comfortable seating
customer_reviews.text: love it all. Put pillows on each end. It's part of a seating area on the patio
customer_reviews.author: Bellal Donna

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking piece
customer_reviews.text: Product was slightly damaged in shipping. We were able to fix the broken pieces. Company offered to replace swing but there was no need. It was very nice of them to offer. I had an old swing that I was going to replace the boards. This was easier, probably cheaper and this swing was a lot better looking.
customer_reviews.author: Bambi R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Porch Swing
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Looks great! Very comfortable! Great price! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Eli's mom

customer_reviews.title: Hanging from a ceiling
customer_reviews.text: If hanging from a porch ceiling you'll need to buy the hardware to hang it. Great swing though, pretty well made.
customer_reviews.author: R. Walker

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: seat is a little short in width. I'm 5'2 130 lbs. works ok, but could use a little more bottom room.
customer_reviews.author: victoria dossey

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I just love this and the price wasn't to bad either.
customer_reviews.author: Annette. Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Warped wood, unsafe swing, parts falling off
customer_reviews.text: One year old swing falling apart, poorly constructed, now unsafe to use. I am asking seller to send me a replacement swing ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Redfastcar

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Some of the screws were a little tight but I’m a weakling and managed to get them in. The swing looks very nice and was easy to assemble. So far very sturdy and comfortable. I have a cushion on the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Angela King

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. The chain in the back needs to be longer so the swing can tilt backwards slightly.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen F

customer_reviews.title: Swing
customer_reviews.text: The swing is well made and looks perfect on my front porch. I get to drink my tea and wave at all my friends who drive by.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Davis

customer_reviews.title: Porch swing
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was just a little wider on the seat but still comfortable and woh the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What the swing was made of.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product, very heavy, very sturdy, better than expected. Great quality for the price. I was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Cope

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a very sturdy swing!
customer_reviews.text: High quality and very sturdy. It was very easy to assemble - everything came with it. The chains are heavy duty - it’s a very fine product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: David Myers

customer_reviews.title: Porch swing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my new porch swing!Can’t wait to purchase some additional pieces for my porch.
customer_reviews.author: becky farmer

customer_reviews.title: Quality swing
customer_reviews.text: This swing is awesome. Low cost and quality materials. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: It was wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: This was the easiest item I have ever put together.
customer_reviews.author: Janet sparks

customer_reviews.title: Lovely swing!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great swing! Easy to put together and it looks so nice under our patio!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Could have a little better instructions on how to assemble it. Nice looking swing.
customer_reviews.author: tom  szynski

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Swing. Have it hanging from a tree. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mick Milhollin

customer_reviews.title: Momo Approved!
customer_reviews.text: Momo approved! For added stability, you could probably use wood glue in addition to the screws they give you.
customer_reviews.author: Christian P.

product_meta.title: Best Choice Products 48in Wooden Curved Back Hanging Porch Swing Bench w/Metal Chains for Patio, Deck, Garden - Brown
product_meta.description:
Specifications:
Overall Dimensions: 48"(L) x 20.5"(W) x 22"(H)
Hanging: 52.75"(H)
Weight Capacity: 500 lbs.
Weight: 35.3 lbs.
Material: Wood, Metal
Assembly required (with hardware and instructions)

BCP SKU: SKY3539
feature_bullets: DECORATIVE HANGING BENCH: This beautiful outdoor wooden bench hangs from a pair of 4-foot metal chains, letting you swing and sway as you lounge
GREAT CONVERSATION PIECE: Long enough to seat up to 3 people, it's perfect for inviting friends over and enjoying fresh air, relaxation, and good company
CLASSIC DESIGN: Crafted with a simple slat curved back and seat design with a smooth, elegant finish to complement any porch or patio
DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: Made of weather-resistant Acacia wood, and the metal chains are coated with rust-resistant zinc oxide for a setup that will last for years
OVERALL DIMENSIONS: 48"(L) x 20.5"(W) x 22"(H); Weight Capacity: 500 lbs.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars124 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
